channel.title: Client IP changing? 317
channel.description: How do I change the IP that my client is set to? I've tried changing all the IPs in all of the files I could find it in. But it still isn't changed? Any ideas?

item.title: Client IP changing? 317
item.dc:creator: @Syme Syme
item.description:
@Syme wrote:

Go to your Client Files, You should see notepads there, then Ctrl+F gui.java or gui. It would come up with 2 guis, select the notepad one. Ctrl+f and search serverip, and change the Ip. Save then Compile.

Read full topic
